item.title: Dash: Configurable dcc.Interval
item.description: As I mentioned in my blog post about building a Real-Time Crypto Dashboard, I’ve recently been working with the Dash low-code framework for building interactive data apps. I was using the dcc.Interval component to automatically refresh components on the page and wanted to make the refresh interval configurable. In this blog post we’ll learn how to do that. Figure 1.
